content: 100% agree that AI is the most compelling area of computing today. I have long been focused on data for entertainment but now I see all that data as simply fodder for AI. AI and ML eat data. Getting the right piece of content to the right consumer and personalization is enabled by metadata. But we have rapidly evolving beyond that. AI needs micro-data (as opposed to Big Data) to enable hyper-personalization. Which is critical as we automate content creation, not just consumption. It’s a true revolution that incorporates the transactional web and the 3D/immersive web. Business models must shift (profoundly) as well.
